name: PickaNumber
0:
”Alexa, pick a number”
”Alexa, open Pick a number and choose a number”
”Alexa, open Pick a number and pick a number”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pick a number
des: Having trouble deciding who goes first in a game? Want a random way to decide whose turn it is to do the dishes? Have each person choose a number from 1-100 and then ask Alexa to pick a number. Whoever guessed the number closest to Alexa's wins!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
